doc:
Christopher Casson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Casson 0 Christopher T. Casson (20 March 1912 – 9 July 1996) was an English-born actor who became a citizen of Ireland in 1946. His work included stage, screen, radio and television roles. His portrayal of a Church of Ireland canon in the long-running series The Riordans made him known nationwide. Christopher_T._Casson ( 20_March_1912 – 9_July_1996 ) was an_English-born_actor who became a_citizen of Ireland in 1946 . His_work included stage_,_screen_,_radio_and_television_roles . His_portrayal of a_Church of Ireland_canon in the_long-running_series The_Riordans made him known nationwide .
